code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import backendURL from"../components/config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Industries=()=>{const[industries,setIndustries]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchIndustries=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(backendURL,"/api/industries"));setIndustries(response.data);};fetchIndustries();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"services-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Industries we work with"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"services-grid",children:industries.map(industrie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"servicepage-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:industrie.image_url,alt:industrie.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:industrie.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:industrie.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/industries/".concat(industrie.id),className:"learn-more-btn",children:"Learn More"})]},industrie.id))})]});};export default Industries;
